channel.title: 彭博-市场
channel.description: 这是一个追踪彭博-市场news的种子

item.title: 捷克央行一位高级官员试图平息对加速货币宽松政策的猜测，称决策者应稳步降息以阻止通胀回升
item.description:
A senior Czech central banker sought to douse speculation over accelerated monetary easing, saying policymakers should cut interest rates at a steady pace to stem any return in inflation https://t.co/GoiyDaDx2H

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 12, 2024

item.title: 欧洲最安全证券市场的规模将有史以来首次超过 1 万亿欧元
item.description:
The market for Europe’s safest securities looks set to grow beyond €1 trillion for the first time on record https://t.co/iuL6q8rbYI

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 12, 2024

item.title: 比利时财长表示，欧盟各国财长支持克里斯塔琳娜-格奥尔基耶娃连任国际货币基金组织（IMF）总裁
item.description:
EU finance ministers are backing Kristalina Georgieva for a second term as head of the IMF, Belgian finance minister says https://t.co/srUlSRUq2k

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 12, 2024

item.title: 中国钢铁密集型的房地产和制造业面临的持续问题拖累了铁矿石需求
item.description:
Persistent issues facing China’s steel-intensive real estate and manufacturing sectors have weighed on iron ore demand https://t.co/M2Q5KmqwNt

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 12, 2024

item.title: 根据上个月一次决策会议的会议记录，韩国央行的一位成员认为，在经济增长继续回升而通胀仍然高企的情况下，没有理由急于降息。
item.description:
A Bank of Korea member sees no reason to rush into an interest-rate cut at a time when economic growth continues to pick up while inflation remains elevated, according to minutes from a decision meeting last month. https://t.co/iAvAVNRM1l

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 12, 2024

item.title: 日本央行官员将在周五看到春季工资谈判的结果后决定是否在 3 月份加息
item.description:
BOJ officials will decide on whether to raise rates in March after they've seen the tally from spring wage talks due Friday https://t.co/rK3jqe5z4D

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 12, 2024

item.title: 英国散户投资者正在以拍卖价格购买吉尔债券
item.description:
UK retail investors are getting access to Gilts at auction prices https://t.co/LKaAfLAiRz

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 12, 2024

item.title: 中国股市及其主要商品之一的价格对中国经济前景发出了截然不同的信号
item.description:
China’s stock market, and the price of one of its key commodities, are sending starkly differing signals on the country’s economic prospects https://t.co/OPz2DZ8vgQ

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 12, 2024

item.title: 俄罗斯首次以间谍罪拘留了一名韩国公民，加剧了两国之间的紧张关系
item.description:
Russia has taken a South Korean national into custody on espionage charges for the first time, adding to the strains between the two nations https://t.co/gZSmyRj25s

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 12, 2024

item.title: 香港第三大连锁超市 U Select 在经济不景气的情况下关闭门店，而购物者则涌向中国的山姆会员店和好市多。
item.description:
Hong Kong's third-largest supermarket chain U Select is shutting stores amid economic headwinds, while shoppers flock across the border to Sam's Club and Costco in China https://t.co/82w3I3xFUF

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 12, 2024

item.title: 英国失业率自 7 月以来首次上升，工资增长放缓
item.description:
Britain’s unemployment rate rises for the first time since July as wage growth eases https://t.co/x9AuabydxQ

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 12, 2024

item.title: 消息人士称，中国监管机构要求部分贷款机构限制使用支持地方政府融资工具发行离岸债券的还款支持机制
item.description:
Chinese regulators told some of the country’s lenders to limit their use of a repayment-support mechanism that has backed offshore bond issuance by local government financing vehicles, sources say https://t.co/yrJ3RW5P49

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 12, 2024

item.title: 中国一些新旧经济部门的牛市已经开始，这表明投资者从习近平主席促进经济和市场的措施中看到了当前估值的上升空间。
item.description:
A bull market has begun in some of China’s old and new economy sectors, indicating investors are seeing an upside to current valuations from President Xi Jinping’s measures to bolster the economy and markets. https://t.co/ZplqoUMpkj

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 12, 2024

item.title: 非洲主权债券的涨势几乎没有喘息的时间，埃塞俄比亚、加纳、卢旺达等国的债券价格升至近两年的高点
item.description:
The rally in Africa’s sovereign bonds is barely taking time for a breather, with the prices of bonds in countries including Ethiopia, Ghana, Rwanda rising to almost two-year highs https://t.co/EhLK3NnPzm

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 12, 2024

item.title: 新加坡正在为人们进出这个热带城市国家提供更多便利，允许司机通过两个陆路检查站入境时使用二维码代替护照
item.description:
Singapore is making it even easier for people to come and go from the tropical city-state, allowing drivers crossing into the country through two land checkpoints to use a QR code instead of their passports https://t.co/SY2DaVwm5N

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 12, 2024

item.title: 惠誉解决方案公司（Fitch Solutions）旗下 BMI 的一份报告称，韩国新政党的出现可能会降低总统尹锡烈的保守党在 4 月大选中获胜的几率。
item.description:
The emergence of new South Korean political parties is likely to lower the chances of a victory by President Yoon Suk Yeol’s conservative party in April general elections, a report by BMI, a Fitch Solutions company, says https://t.co/0DSb4uWlr9

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 12, 2024

item.title: 日本央行退出负利率制度有可能导致短期借贷成本出现超预期的飙升，并在整个国家的债券收益率曲线上产生影响
item.description:
The Bank of Japan exiting its negative interest rate regime risks causing a bigger-than-expected jump in short-term borrowing costs that would reverberate across the nation’s bond-yield curve https://t.co/8oXnb0qnNs

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 12, 2024

item.title: 印度政府驳斥中国外交部就印度总理莫迪周末访问有争议边境地区一事发表的言论
item.description:
India’s government rejects comments made by China’s foreign ministry over the visit of Prime Minister Narendra Modi to a disputed border region on the weekend https://t.co/paTNg9GWGQ

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 12, 2024

item.title: 中国东北地区迎来疫情后首艘国际邮轮
item.description:
China’s northeast welcomed its first international cruise ship since the pandemic https://t.co/JOnj77xZQt

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 12, 2024

item.title: 在弗拉基米尔-普京（Vladimir Putin）准备就任新一届总统之际，俄罗斯紧张的精英们正在争夺位置，决心继续他在乌克兰的战争。
item.description:
Russia's nervous elite is jostling for position as Vladimir Putin prepares for his new term as president, determined to pursue his war in Ukraine https://t.co/Jn5fGfR2B0

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 12, 2024

item.title: Old Mutual 表示，新业务的 "超常增长 "推动非洲资产规模最大的保险公司去年利润增长高达 45
item.description:
Old Mutual said “exceptional growth” in new business drove profit at Africa’s biggest insurer by assets as much as 45% higher last year https://t.co/WlDzTdIue9

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 12, 2024

item.title: 日本第一生命保险公司和 Benefit One 批准了一项价值 20 亿美元的交易，经过罕见的竞标，这家日本最大的上市人寿保险公司将接管这家企业服务公司。
item.description:
Japan’s Dai-ichi Life and Benefit One approve a $2 billion transaction that will see the nation’s largest listed life insurer take over the corporate services company following a rare bidding contest https://t.co/AFraRxTRzX

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 12, 2024

item.title: 航空业全球机构的负责人表示，将空难定为刑事犯罪是 "绝对错误的"--这是对美国司法部调查波音公司在阿拉斯加航空公司空中门塞爆炸事件中的行为的斥责。
item.description:
The head of the airline industry’s global body says the criminalization of air accidents is “absolutely wrong” — a rebuke to the Department of Justice’s probe of Boeing’s conduct around the mid-air Alaska Airlines door plug blowout https://t.co/E4l75ezjGA

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 12, 2024

item.title: 据路透社报道，中国体操运动员出身的企业家李宁正在考虑将其同名运动服装品牌从香港股市私有化。
item.description:
Chinese gymnast-turned entrepreneur Li Ning is considering taking his eponymous sportswear brand private from the Hong Hong stock market, Reuters reports https://t.co/0ohnifKnvU

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 12, 2024

item.title: 消息人士称，日本央行官员正逐步接近加息，并将在下周的政策会议上决定是否在本月加息，目前结果尚不确定。
item.description:
Bank of Japan officials are edging closer to raising interest rates and will decide whether to move this month at next week’s policy meeting, with the outcome currently too close to call, sources say https://t.co/ytXv2T9KcF

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 12, 2024

item.title: 今天的美国通胀数据可能会鼓励美联储在降息问题上保持耐心
item.description:
US inflation data today may encourage the Fed to maintain its patient approach to rate cuts https://t.co/Isp2q9QeRq

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 12, 2024

item.title: 一项调查显示，近一半的英国购房者因担心房价飙升而将加快今年的购房计划
item.description:
Almost half of UK house hunters are set to accelerate their purchase plans this year, fearing a jump in prices, a survey shows https://t.co/GmIy7m3f4H

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 12, 2024

item.title: 在弹药严重不足的情况下，欧盟正在寻求新的资金来帮助乌克兰。阅读布鲁塞尔版。
item.description:
With ammunition running very low, the EU is seeking fresh funds to help Ukraine. Read the Brussels Edition. https://t.co/GBjxg9755x
